name: Unravel Carbon
long_description:
Unravel Carbon is  an enterprise software that helps companies track and reduce their carbon emissions, focusing on Asia, where 70% of global supply chains are. It uses AI/ML to help enterprises transform any operational data into full carbon supply chain data, helping them measure, track and report on their sustainability performance, identify climate risks and opportunities.

It is already serving some of the world’s largest companies and is backed by Sequoia and Y Combinator.
one_liner: Enterprise software for companies to track & reduce their carbon…
